definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Hai3 yang2 Shi2 you2 Zong3 gong1 si1
Zhong1 guo2 He2 neng2 Zong3 gong1 si1

sentences.english: Lummedic is the service extension in China to its European parent company.
sentences.chinese: 珑美蒂治疗机构是欧洲总公司在中国的服务扩展。

sentences.english: Have you got a reply from your head office?
sentences.chinese: 收到你们总公司的复电了吗？

sentences.english: Corporation for the construction of major support strengthening core competitiveness .
sentences.chinese: 主要用于支持中建总公司增强核心竞争力。

sentences.english: I’ll write to our home office to waive our claim immediately.
sentences.chinese: 我立即写信给我们的总公司提出放弃索赔。

sentences.english: Railway material purchase and supply are the main operation of CRMSC.
sentences.chinese: 集采专供业务是铁路物资总公司的主营业务。

sentences.english: Head office provides the infrastructure to run Tesco efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 总公司提供基础设施以有效地管理乐扣。

sentences.english: Head office is located in the scenic southern bank of Qiantang River in Hangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 总公司座落于风景秀丽的杭州钱塘江南岸。

sentences.english: Collect related information for the head office.
sentences.chinese: 收集相关的信息发送到总公司。

sentences.english: Mr. Zhang signs the contract on behalf of the China National Silk Import &Export Corporation.
sentences.chinese: 张先生代表中国丝绸进出口总公司在合同上签了字。

sentences.english: No, I will be transfered to head office.
sentences.chinese: 不，我就要被调回总公司了。

sentences.english: You letter of 15th August addressed to our Head Office has been passed on to us for attention and reply.
sentences.chinese: 您八月十五日致我总公司的信函已转交到我处作复。

sentences.english: You are able to purchase goods directly from company once you become our business associate's agent.
sentences.chinese: 成为本公司代理后，您可选择直接向总公司拿货。

sentences.english: My replacement has already arrived from our head office.
sentences.chinese: 我的接替者已经从我们的总公司来了。

sentences.english: China Railway Engineering Corporation is the country’s biggest construction enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 中国铁路工程总公司是中国最大的工程建造企业。

sentences.english: Umicore, based in EU, is a specialty materials group.
sentences.chinese: 总公司位于欧洲，优美科公司是一家特种材料集团。

sentences.english: China National Salt Industry Corporation ensured the salt supply of disaster areas.
sentences.chinese: 中国盐业总公司调运食盐保证灾区供应。
